member.name: D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_ACCESSIBLE_ENCRYPTION_INPUT
member.summary: Contains input data for a D3D11_AUTHENTICATED_CONFIGURE_ENCRYPTION_WHEN_ACCESSIBLE command.
